title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8138.14 - Town of North Greenbush
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8138.14 - Town of North Greenbush

State Regulations
(a) Route 43. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 43 from the North Greenbush -
Sand Lake town line westerly to US Route 4 (RM 2026+- to RM 2063+-), a distance
of 3.7+- miles. (b) US Route 4. The
northbound and southbound roadways of the US Route 4/Route 43 overlap from

Route 43 southerly to the North Greenbush -East Greenbush town line (RM 1034+-
to RM 1039+-), a distance of 0.5+- mile. (c) Route 136. Route 136 (Williams Road, Winter Street Extension and Whiteview Road) between US Route 4 (North Greenbush

Road) and Route 150 (West Sand Lake Road). (d) Route 150. Route 150 (West Sand Lake

Road) between Route 136 (Whiteview Road) and Route 66 (Main Avenue). (e) Route 66. Route 66 (Main Avenue) between

Route 150 (West Sand Lake Road) and a point 0.25+- mile south of Route 150
(West Sand Lake Road) intersection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8138.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
